prompts: Generate an electric-type Pokemon with a stormy appearance and a strong, muscular build.
Create a mythical creature that has a striking blue color and powerful wings.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the power of thunder with a bold design.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that commands the skies and has a mischievous personality.
Design a Pokemon that is both intimidating and majestic, with an electric aura.
Give me a detailed description of a flying-type Pokemon with a unique, cloud-like tail.
Make a creature that represents the essence of storms and has a dynamic presence.
